page.title: 14Thoughts & Sayings:Gringley
page.content: { THOUGHTS}:Some young people feel that more baby swings,more football,Cubs, Brownies & Guide Packs,a young drama group,& a leisure centre would help to improve their village.Some elderly people feel that more social events,a better bus service,bowling green,OAP Centre would improve the village.Some adults think there is too much litter/ aircraft & traffic noise;they'd also like piped gas and more village shops. {SAYINGS}:The cross on Cross Hill is called "The Butter Cross" by locals but it isn't authentic.They believe {either}that it is a place where priests collected rents from market stalls{or}a memorial to the wife of an English King who died soon after a journey which included Gringley{or a place of prayer before farmers went to market{or}a place where women made butter,cheese & flour.
